column5: While I will be up at Rice Lake for 2 weeks, looking for a good chicken wing and pizza place to hit!  Can anyone advise on a good place in the area?
there is a pizza place in Bewdley, park or dock your boat out front

Bewdley Pizza is the best. Don't bother asking for exacter cheez.  Jim's Pizza in Port Hope main st and other locations in peterbourgh  is very good. Port Hope has a small dine in area.  And I've heard about a poutine joint across from MNR building Peterbough that is good. The turkey poutine was recommended.  The Railside is also a good dine in restaurant in Port Hope.
Rhinos is good for wings…other food like that…Bewdley Pizza is good also, look for the triangle building
I think thursdays nights they do a special on wings…last thursday there was like 50-70 people
I will second Bewdley Pizza and also Rhinos. On the weekendz, Rhinos is always busy, either the food is still good or the beer is really cold.

I will second Bewdley Pizza and also Rhinos. On the weekendz, Rhinos is always busy, either the food is still good or the beer is really cold. Get a pizza at the pizza place and drink a cold beer at Rhino's while waiting…always a good plan!
I think I had it from their before, Bewdley, think I'll give it another go then.  From what I remember they closed early, like 9 or 10pm?
Yeah, bewdley pizza is awesome. Order from the water, and pick up by boat! Best pizza around.
Pass on the pie and head to Muddy's BBQ Pit in Keene. You will not be disappointed!!!
Yeah, muddy's is great too!  S.
Pass on the pie and head to Muddy's BBQ Pit in Keene. You will not be disappointed!!!  That is good to know, any recommendations on the menu?
For a first timer, I would suggest the carnivore sampler. I think it has a couple ribs, pulled pork, sausage and brisket. Honestly, I've never had a bad meal there. Great place.
